00076         class AnimationController : public Thread {
00077 
00078                 private:
00079                         Animation* animation;
00080

00082                         ExecutionObject* execObj;               //useful if the object isn't playing
00083                                                                                         //or it's a Ginga Settings Node.
00084                         AttributionEvent* event;                //attribution event
00085 
00086                         //useful when the animation is over a region
00087                         LayoutRegion* initRegion;

00089 
00090                         string propName;                        //name of the property (can be a group
00091                                                                                 //of properties like bounds, location,
00092                                                                                 //etc.)
00093                         bool isExecObjAnim;
00094 
00095                         //animation parameters
00096                         vector <string>* params;        //parameters passe by the author
00097                         vector <string> propertySingleNames;
00098                         vector <double> initValues;
00099                         vector <string>* strTargetValues;
00100                         vector <double>* targetValues;
00101 
00102                         double initTime;
00103                         double duration;
00104 
00105                         int stepSize; //this would be a vector
00106 
00107                 public:
00108                         static void startAnimation(ExecutionObject* execObj,
00109                                         FormatterPlayerAdapter* player,
00110                                         AttributionEvent* event,
00111                                     string value,
00112                                     Animation* anim);
00113

00117                                         ExecutionObject* execObj,
00118                                         FormatterPlayerAdapter* player,
00119                                         AttributionEvent* event,
00120                                     string value,
00121                                     Animation* anim);
00122 
00123                         virtual ~AnimationController();
00124 
00125                 private:
00136                         void run();
00137

00149                         bool loadTargetValues();
